sentences: Louis Vola (La Seyne-sur-Mer, France, 6 July 1902 â€“ 15 August 1990, Paris), was a French double-bassist known for his work with the Quintette du Hot Club de France.
In 1934 he was a founding member of the Quintette du Hot Club de France.
In a 1976 interview, Vola recalled that he discovered Joseph and Django Reinhardt playing guitars together on a beach at Toulon.
